author: lgray
body:
Activate timing-aware clustering for Shashlik.
Tested in SLHC13_patch1 for 13802.

This assumes that the Shashlik timing parameters are identical to the present EE, which was supported by a comment from a Shashlik expert at the Upgrade Meeting on 5 June 2014.
title: Shashlik PFClusters with timing
